alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Furnas; Gosper; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 03 at 3:27PM CDT until October 03 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Phelps County in south central Nebraska... Gosper County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Dawson County in south central Nebraska... Northeastern Furnas County in south central Nebraska... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 327 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Smithfield to near Arapahoe, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Smithfield around 335 PM CDT. Overton around 345 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 229 and 253. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings.
